title: 整合包蹦溃
author: KarsonCN
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Ooh. Shiny.

Time: 15-11-4 下午12:51
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/cricketcraft/chisel/api/IMC

replies.author: xpen
replies.txt_content: chisel 凿子mod报错，删除之或者更新到新版试试

replies.author: 魔末
replies.txt_content:
你可以试着用java7
或者调一下最大内存
如果不行的话能否说一下你在崩溃前做了些什么后崩溃了

replies.author: KarsonCN
replies.txt_content:
xpen 发表于 2015-11-4 15:12
chisel 凿子mod报错，删除之或者更新到新版试试
我试试

replies.author: KarsonCN
replies.txt_content:
xpen 发表于 2015-11-4 12:52
chisel 凿子mod报错，删除之或者更新到新版试试
能教我看错误报告吗

replies.author: xpen
replies.txt_content:
158227452 发表于 2015-11-4 18:13
能教我看错误报告吗
①cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/cricketcraft/chisel/api/IMC
这一行可看出com/cricketcraft/chisel/api不存在，而chisel就是凿子mod，

②UCHI        chisel{1.5.6b} [Chisel] (Chisel-Mod-1.7.10.jar) 
这行说明你用了凿子版本1.5.6b，而我去官网查发现凿子版本号已经是2以上了。

③根据推测尝试，然后尝试之前记得备份存档。
④有点耐心就行了，仔细看log，答案都在字里行间，不耐烦就没辙了。

replies.txt_content:
